item.title: ISCA 2021
item.description: This is a blog post in progress. I’m publishing it so that it doesn’t die in my hard disk. ISCA is one of the premier conferences in the Computer Architecture domain. The pandemic forced many conferences to go online, but it also made these conferences more accessible for people around the globe. The first commercial microprocessor Intel 4004 (released in 1971) turns 50 this year. There were panel discussions on how the microprocessor industry has evolved over the 50 years and what lies ahead.
